subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: DeMar DeRozan scored 30 points, and the visiting Toronto Raptors tied a franchise record with their 47th victory by defeating the Detroit Pistons, 116-107.
snippet: DeMar DeRozan scored 30 points, and the visiting Toronto Raptors tied a franchise record with their 47th victory by defeating the Detroit Pistons, 116-107.
